sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of American Express ( AXP ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.4%.
Year to date, American Express registers a 3.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ), trading down 1.1%.
Goldman Sachs Group is showing a gain of 0.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.7%, and Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading up 1.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
